title: Start Checklist
instructions: Start a new checklist

title: Tire Pressures
instructions:
# Check all tire pressures
* Truck front: **80** psi
* Truck rear: **65** psi
* RV **110** psi

title: Dump Tanks
instructions: Dump both black and gray tanks

title: Fill Water Tank
instructions: Fill fresh water tank appropriately

title: Fill-up Fuel Tanks
instructions:
Calculate amount of fuel needed, and fill tanks appropriately.
For shorter trips, get enough for entire trip.
For example:
* Inks Lake is 68 miles.
* Figure 7.5 if hilly, or 9-11 if < 65 mph.
* Main tank is 50 gallons
* Aux tank about 50 more
* So fill main tank if entire trip < 500 miles.
* Fill aux also if < 1000 miles.

title: Inspect Roof
instructions: Ensure everything on roof looks ok. Check for leaks, cracks or other damage

title: Inspect Under RV
instructions: Ensure everything under RV looks ok. Check for leaks, and verify flaps under RV not coming loose.

title: Plan Route
instructions:
Plan route for the trip.

Use RV Trip Wizard to identify rest stops about every hour, with longer stops every 2 hours.

Identify fuel requirements.

title: Move Deck Furniture
instructions: Remove furniture from ramp deck and fold up and strap to loft ladder.

title: Roll Up Deck Rug
instructions: Roll up the ramp deck rug and put inside office.

title: Strap TV to Wall
instructions: Connect the strap across the face of the TV. Insert a stuffed toy between the strap and the screen to protect it from being scratched during travel.

title: Move Bricks under Shelley's Recliner
instructions: Move the bricks under Shelley's recliner before bringing in slides to avoid scratching floor.

title: Retract Bedroom Slide
instructions: Retrack the bedroom slide. Switch is located on front panel

title: Retract Main Slides
instructions: Retrack the living room slides. Switch is located on front panel

title: Retract Ramp Awning
instructions: Disconnect ramp awning arms and slide into end rail. Retrack the ramp awning. Switch is located on rear panel

title: Close Ramp
instructions: Remove all furniture on the ramp deck. Roll up carpet. Raise and latch ramp.

title: Latch Door Handles
instructions: Close both door handles so they cover door to prevent accidental opening during travel.

title: Retract Rear Awning
instructions: Retract the rear awning. The switch is located on the rear panel.

title: Retract Front Awning
instructions: Retract the front awning. Switch is located on front panel

title: Disconnect Propane
instructions:
Turn off and disconnect big propane tank.

Turn off 30 lb tanks while travelling.

title: Turn Off Water Heater
instructions:
Turn off both propane and electric water heater switches.

Switches are located on the front panel.

title: Turn On Inverter
instructions:
Ensure that power inverter is turned on.
Switch is located beside fireplace below front panel.

title: Connect Truck
instructions:
Hitch up trailer to truck.
1. Drop tailgate
2. Release 5th wheel hitch handle
3. Back in truck until kingpin close to hitch
4. Raise landing gear until truck and trailer at same height (-1/2 inch)
5. Backup truck until hitch latches
6. Insert pin to lock hitch
7. Connect trailer electrical cable to side connector inside bed
8. Connect safety wire to hitch handle
9. Rock truck to ensure good latching

title: Raise Landing Gear and Level Up
instructions:
Raise the Level-Up and front landing gear.
Level-up control is in the basement.
Select manual, then retract.

title: Disconnect Shore Power
instructions: Disconnect A/C power cable, and stow away in box in back of truck

title: Connect Shore Power
instructions: Connect A/C power cable from cable in box in back of truck

title: Lower Landing Gear
instructions: Position pads under landing gear. Then lower landing gear until kingpin just begins to lift off of the hitch. Switch is located outside the RV on the leading wall under the kingpin.

title: Extend Bedroom Slide
instructions:
Extend the bedroom slide.
Switch is located on front panel.
Check to ensure nothing has fallen between the slide edges and walls.

title: Extend Main Slides
instructions:
Extend the living room slides.
Switch is located on front panel.
Check to ensure nothing has fallen between the slide edges and walls.

title: Open Ramp
instructions:
Restore ramp patio. 1. Lower ramp 1. Setup railingsn1. Replace carpet
  • Replace all furniture on the ramp deck

title: Extend Ramp Awning
instructions:
Extend ramp awning and reconnect ramp awning arms.
Switch is located on rear panel

title: Restore Door Steps and Handles
instructions: Open both door handles and lower steps.

title: Extend Rear Awning
instructions: Extend the rear awning. The switch is located on the rear panel.

title: Extend Front Awning
instructions: Extend the front awning. Switch is located on front panel

title: Turn on Propane
instructions: Turn on 30 lb tanks.

title: Turn On Water Heater
instructions:
Turn on electric water heater if shore power is available. Otherwise turn on propane water heater switch.
Switches are located on the front panel.

title: Connect Water Hose
instructions: Connect and turn on water hose.

title: Connect Sewer Hose
instructions:
Optionally, connected sewer hose to 1 or both sewer fittings.
For shorter stays, may skip this, or just connect the front to allow showers.
